author: Liturgist
body:
Does .NET MAUI mean that PowerShell will include a GUI environment? Are there any implications?

https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/introducing-net-multi-platform-app-ui/

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@Liturgist All PowerShell UI investigations live in https://github.com/PowerShell/GraphicalTools. As I know they are waiting MAUI preview to continue a work on PowerShell GUI cmdlets.
GitHub
PowerShell/GraphicalTools
A module that mixes PowerShell and GUIs! - built on Avalonia and gui.cs - PowerShell/GraphicalTools

title: .NET MAUI in PowerShell
